title: Burnley: third kit for 2023-24 released
title_page: Burnley: third kit for 2023-24 released - BBC Sport
maintext:
Burnley have unveiled their new third kit for their return to the Premier League.
The club said their dark navy shirt is "inspired by the iconic floodlights at Turf Moor" and the design "celebrates the special feeling of a night of football under the lights".
Burnley have already released their claret and blue home kit and their away strip, with the away shirt primarily yellow.
